name: Wall Slicer - Slash Games
description:
Wall Slicer - a place where your fingers are your weapon! The eggs are on the edge of danger! Awakening your senses, sharpen your slicing skills to save the eggs!!!
With stunning graphics and lots of challenging levels, the slicing adventure Wall Slicer is waiting for you!

HOW TO PLAY
It’s so easy. All you need to do is to slice the wall and shrink it by using your fingers. Keep an eye on the eggs since they are easily broken. If you touch the eggs before your cut requirement is completed, you will lose one life.

FEATURES
Download now for FREE and experience all these amazing features:
*2 Modes with 130+ levels packed with unlimited fun – Master your skills with EASY & HARD mode.
*Powerful Boosters – Help you get BETTER, FASTER and EASIER to protect the eggs.
*Simple but stunning Graphics – Experience with different designed walls.

NEED HELP?
Please feel free to contact us if you need any support to our email wallslicer@avid.ly or to our Facebook fan page https://www.facebook.com/wallslicer/

So, what are you waiting for???
Start S/L/I/C/I/N/G and feel the excitement!
